Title: "In Praise of Pootling"

Despite the rush and roar, concrete crush,
stand a moment in Houston, in hush.
Ponder the slow pulse of Glanaman's pace,
a mum's wisdom etched in the village face.
New laws whisper a tale, an old song,
20mph, where hearts belong.
In this snail's ballet, find troupe and place,
Rediscover life's joys at a slower pace.
